data.client_settings: Google Chrome, Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 10143
data.actual_result: It gets out of sync. Pause/Play stops working. Displaying the wrong music
data.expected_result: It should display the previous music, like it does on main client (the one sync with Spotify)
data.short_description: Discord's Spotify Integration not accurate to other people
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord & Spotify and start playing something - Login into Discord with another account in a different browser (or icognito) - Play the previous music. (double click on previous)
